user_query: I want to find the half-staff events for the state of New York and check the current status of the flag for West Virginia.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the list of half-staff events for the state of New York.
Extract details such as flag, issued by, date issued, start date, end date, title, description, and URL for each event retrieved in step 1.
Check the current status of the flag for West Virginia.
